[Home](./index.md) &gt; [clm-core](./clm-core.md)

## clm-core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthGuard](./clm-core.authguard.md) | Static class which exposes express-auth-middlewares |
|  [BaseBackendDTO](./clm-core.basebackenddto.md) | DTO which exposes only READ operations |
|  [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) | DAO which exposes all CRUD opeartions |
|  [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) | The base-datamodel defines attributes which every document in the database has in common |
|  [BaseExtensionCtrl](./clm-core.baseextensionctrl.md) | Simple controller which has an express router |
|  [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md) | DTO which exposes only a subset of attributes! |
|  [BaseModelController](./clm-core.basemodelcontroller.md) | A controller which offers CRUD opeartions as REST-Interface on a certain resource. Expects as types <code>DAO</code> which has to be of type [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md)<!-- -->, <code>Datamodel</code> of type [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) and <code>FDTO</code> of type [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md) |
|  [ConsumerBDTO](./clm-core.consumerbdto.md) | Backend DTO for consumer. Based on [ConsumerModel](./clm-core.consumermodel.md)<!-- -->. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) as adapter. |
|  [ConsumerModel](./clm-core.consumermodel.md) | Cnsumer datamodel which is used by [ConsumerBDTO](./clm-core.consumerbdto.md) |
|  [GroupBDTO](./clm-core.groupbdto.md) | Backend DTO for user. Based on [GroupModel](./clm-core.groupmodel.md) The instance [groupBDTOInstance](./clm-core.groupbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer |
|  [GroupModel](./clm-core.groupmodel.md) | Group datamodel which is used by [GroupBDTO](./clm-core.groupbdto.md) |
|  [JwtService](./clm-core.jwtservice.md) | Service for creating access/refresh token for user and verify if a token is valid |
|  [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) | Adapter for MariaDB and default adapter for [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) |
|  [PathBDTO](./clm-core.pathbdto.md) | Backend DTO for path. Based on [PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md) The instance [pathBDTOInstance](./clm-core.pathbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer |
|  [PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md) | Path datamodel which is used by [PathBDTO](./clm-core.pathbdto.md) |
|  [RelationBDTO](./clm-core.relationbdto.md) | Backend DTO for relations. Based on [RelationModel](./clm-core.relationmodel.md) The instance [relationBDTOInstance](./clm-core.relationbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer |
|  [RelationModel](./clm-core.relationmodel.md) | Relation datamodel which is used by [RelationBDTO](./clm-core.relationbdto.md) |
|  [SwaggerDefinition](./clm-core.swaggerdefinition.md) | Static class to create the swagger documentation of clm-extensions/clm-core |
|  [UserBDTO](./clm-core.userbdto.md) | Backend DTO for user. Based on [UserModel](./clm-core.usermodel.md) The instance [userBDTOInstance](./clm-core.userbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer |
|  [UserModel](./clm-core.usermodel.md) | User datamodel which is used by [UserBDTO](./clm-core.userbdto.md) |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AdapterInterface](./clm-core.adapterinterface.md) | Interface which database-connectors need to implement. <code>Datamodel</code> is the struture of the document which will be saved in the db. Has to extend [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) |
|  [CheckResource](./clm-core.checkresource.md) | (Optional) payload for the method [AuthGuard.requireMinimumRole()](./clm-core.authguard.requireminimumrole.md) |
|  [GroupPermission](./clm-core.grouppermission.md) | The permissions a user has on a group |
|  [iBaseDatamodel](./clm-core.ibasedatamodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md) |
|  [iBaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.ibasefrontenddto.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [BaseFrontendDTO](./clm-core.basefrontenddto.md) |
|  [iConsumerModel](./clm-core.iconsumermodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [ConsumerModel](./clm-core.consumermodel.md) |
|  [iGroupModel](./clm-core.igroupmodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [GroupModel](./clm-core.groupmodel.md) |
|  [iPathModel](./clm-core.ipathmodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md) |
|  [iRelationModel](./clm-core.irelationmodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [RelationModel](./clm-core.relationmodel.md) |
|  [iUserModel](./clm-core.iusermodel.md) | The payload which is passed to the constructor of [UserModel](./clm-core.usermodel.md) |
|  [Path](./clm-core.path.md) | Subattribute of the payload of [iConsumerModel](./clm-core.iconsumermodel.md) |
|  [PreFetchOptions](./clm-core.prefetchoptions.md) | Payload passed to the method [RelationBDTO.mapRecursiveResources()](./clm-core.relationbdto.maprecursiveresources.md) |
|  [Role](./clm-core.role.md) | The available roles. The number symbolize the strength of the role. The higher the number the stronger the role |
|  [TokenPayload](./clm-core.tokenpayload.md) | The payload which is passed to the methods [JwtService.createToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createtoken.md)<!-- -->, [JwtService.createAccessAndRefreshToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createaccessandrefreshtoken.md) |
|  [TokenVerifyResult](./clm-core.tokenverifyresult.md) | Object which will be returned by method [JwtService.verifyToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.verifytoken.md) |
|  [UserAuthenticationOptions](./clm-core.userauthenticationoptions.md) | (Optional) payload for the method [AuthGuard.requireUserAuthentication()](./clm-core.authguard.requireuserauthentication.md) |
|  [UserGroupOptions](./clm-core.usergroupoptions.md) | (Optional) payload passed to the method [RelationBDTO.getUsersGroups()](./clm-core.relationbdto.getusersgroups.md) |
